memberdef.name: get_filter_data

detaileddescription.para:
Get raw filter data from device with averaging value for_num_averages. Results are stored in filter_buffer which has the size the same as the number of filters, given by get_num_filters() function.
get_num_filters()
Change acquisition mode(continuous, ping-pong, time-interval, s/w and h/w triggers)

Retun minimum filter ouptut (zero value)
get_max_filter_out()

Retun maximu filter ouptut (saturation value)
get_min_filter_out()
Return the number of filters
Get current shutter speed.

parameterdescription.para: integer value for shutter speed value will be set here

detaileddescription.para: Convert shutter speed to exposure time (ms).

parameterdescription.para: - master clock from MCU to sensor (IN)
- double pointer to exposure time value (OUT)

detaileddescription.para: Convert exposure time (ms) to shutter speed.

parameterdescription.para: - master clock from MCU to sensor (IN)
- integer pointer to shutter speed value (OUT)

detaileddescription.para: Change shutter speed to set_shutter.

parameterdescription.para: integer number for shutter speed. Maximum and minimum possible value is indicated by get_min_shutter_speed() and get_max_shutter_speed()
